trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the account and contact data common to principals that can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 封装可以对其进行身份验证的主体所通用的帐户和联系人数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended for use directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数由派生类构造函数调用以初始化基类，不适合直接在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class.
trans-unit.target: 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生的类构造函数初始化基类调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[主体扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" />，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> class by using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的上下文初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended for use directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数由派生类构造函数调用以初始化基类，不适合直接在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class.
trans-unit.target: 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生的类构造函数初始化基类调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[主体扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" />，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

trans-unit.source: The SAM account name for this principal.
trans-unit.target: 此主体的 SAM 帐户名。

trans-unit.source: The password for this account.
trans-unit.target: 此帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies whether the account is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否启用帐户。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> class by using the specified context, SAM account name, password, and enabled value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的上下文、SAM 帐户名、密码和启用的值初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended for use directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数由派生类构造函数调用以初始化基类，不适合直接在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class.
trans-unit.target: 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生的类构造函数初始化基类调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[主体扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the date and time that the account expires.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个可以为 null 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定帐户过期的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the date and time that the account expires, or null if the account never expires.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定帐户过期的日期和时间；如果帐户永远不过期，则为 null。

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate%2A>, the time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate%2A>，时间将默认为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to write in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要编写本地时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性你<xref:System.DateTime>对象作为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可以为 null 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定帐户被锁定的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out, or null if no lockout time is set on the account.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定帐户被锁定的日期和时间；如果帐户上未设置锁定时间，则为 null。

trans-unit.source: The account lockout time is system dependent, and cannot be set by the Account Management API.
trans-unit.target: 帐户锁定时间取决于系统，并不能通过帐户管理 API 设置。

trans-unit.source: To unlock the account, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.UnlockAccount%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要解锁帐户，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.UnlockAccount%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It is possible that an account may not be locked out when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A> returns a non-null value.
trans-unit.target: 可以帐户可能不会被锁定时<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A>返回一个非 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Applications should use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.IsAccountLockedOut%2A> method to determine whether the account is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.IsAccountLockedOut%2A>方法来确定该帐户锁定。

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter" /> object, for use with [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) to set read-only properties before passing the object to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter" /> 对象，供与[按示例查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)一起使用以便在将该对象传递给 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> 之前设置只读属性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: See the [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) documentation for examples.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[查询的示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)有关示例的文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether reversible password encryption is enabled for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定是否为此帐户启用可逆密码加密。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if reversible password encryption is enabled for this account; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为此帐户启用可逆密码加密，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of logon attempts using incorrect credentials for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取对此帐户使用不正确的凭据进行登录的尝试次数。

trans-unit.source: The number of logon attempts using incorrect credentials for this account.
trans-unit.target: 对此帐户使用不正确的凭据进行登录的尝试次数。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> that contains the X509 certificates for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含此账户的 X509 证书的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> that contains the X509 certificates for this account.
trans-unit.target: 包含此账户的 X509 证书的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The password that is changed.
trans-unit.target: 更改的密码。

trans-unit.source: The new password.
trans-unit.target: 新密码。

trans-unit.source: Changes the account password from the old password to the new password.
trans-unit.target: 将帐户旧密码更改为新密码。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this with a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal" />.
trans-unit.target: 请勿将其与 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal" /> 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended for computer principals.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不适合于计算机的主体。

trans-unit.source: Calling this with a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal> will cause a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 调用此操作与<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>将导致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The principal has not been persisted.
trans-unit.target: 未留存该主体。

trans-unit.source: The new password does not meet the complexity requirements.
trans-unit.target: 新密码不符合复杂性要求。

trans-unit.source: The principal is not a user.
trans-unit.target: 该主体不是用户。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether the account may be delegated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个可以为 null 的布尔值，该值指定是否可以委托帐户。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the account may be delegated; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以委托帐户，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个可以为 null 的布尔值，该值指定是否支持此帐户进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the principal is enabled, or null if the account has not been persisted; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用主体，则为 <see langword="true" />（如果未保持该帐户，则为 null）；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the principal has not been persisted in the store, this property returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果不将该主体保持在存储区中，此属性将返回 null。

trans-unit.source: After the principal is persisted, the default enabled setting depends on the store.
trans-unit.target: 保持主体后，默认启用设置取决于存储区。

trans-unit.source: The AD DS and AD LDS stores disable new principals when they are persisted, whereas SAM enables new principals when they are persisted.
trans-unit.target: AD DS 和 AD LDS 存储禁用新的主体时将它们永久保存，而 SAM 使新的主体时将它们永久保存。

trans-unit.source: The application can only set this property to a value after it has been persisted in the store.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序仅可以将此属性设置为一个值后已持久化的存储中。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The application tried to set a null value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序尝试为此属性设置 Null 值。

trans-unit.source: Expires the password for this account.
trans-unit.target: 使此帐户的密码过期。

trans-unit.source: This will force the user to change his/her password at the next logon.
trans-unit.target: 这会强制用户在下次登录时更改其密码。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to force the user to change the password at the next logon.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以强制用户在下次登录时更改密码。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
trans-unit.target: 将更改保存到存储区时发生异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> object that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> 对象，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object that identifies the date and time of the incorrect password try.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象，用于标识不正确的密码尝试的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have an incorrect logon try recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数与类型参数一起使用，可确定记录返回对象的错误登录重试的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the <c>time</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> 枚举值，用于指定应用到 <c>time</c> 参数的匹配类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of authentication principal objects that have an incorrect password try recorded in the specified date and time range.
trans-unit.target: 返回身份验证主体对象的集合，这些对象具有在指定日期和时间范围内进行不正确密码尝试的记录。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult'1" /> that contains one or more <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> objects, or an empty collection if no results are found.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult'1" />，其包含一个或多个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> 对象的；如果未找到任何结果，则为空集合。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 时间将默认为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在本地时间指定的时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`对象作为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" />，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object that identifies the date and time of the password set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象，用于标识密码设置的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have a password set recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数与类型参数共同使用可确定记录返回对象密码设置的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the <c>time</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> 枚举值，用于指定应用到 <c>time</c> 参数的匹配类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> collection of objects that have a bad password attempt within the specified date and time range.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> 集合，对象在指定的日期和时间范围内有一次错误密码尝试。

trans-unit.source: This is the template function for extended classes that wish to implement this functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是想要实现此功能的扩展类的模板函数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> that contains one or more objects of the appropriate principal type, or an empty collection if no matches are found.
trans-unit.target: 含有一个或多个相应主体类型的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" />；如果未找到匹配，则为空集合。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 时间将默认为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在本地时间指定的时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`对象作为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" />，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object that identifies the date and time of the account expiration.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识帐户过期的日期和时间的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have an account expiration recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数与类型参数共同确定时间范围，其中记录有返回的对象的帐户过期时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the <c>time</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> 枚举值，用于指定应用到 <c>time</c> 参数的匹配类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of authentication principal objects that have an account expiration time recorded in the specified date and time range.
trans-unit.target: 返回身份验证主体对象的集合，这些对象拥有记录在指定日期和时间范围内的帐户过期时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> that contains one or more <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" />，它包含一个或多个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 时间将默认为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在本地时间指定的时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`对象作为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" />，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object that identifies the date and time of the password set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象，用于标识密码设置的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have a password set recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数与类型参数共同使用可确定记录返回对象密码设置的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the <c>time</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> 枚举值，用于指定应用到 <c>time</c> 参数的匹配类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> collection of objects that have an expiration time within the specified date and time range.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> 集合，对象在指定的日期和时间范围内具有到期日期。

trans-unit.source: This is the template function for extended classes that wish to implement this functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是想要实现此功能的扩展类的模板函数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> that contains one or more objects of the appropriate principal type, or an empty collection if no matches are found.
trans-unit.target: 含有一个或多个相应主体类型的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" />；如果未找到匹配，则为空集合。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 时间将默认为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在本地时间指定的时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`对象作为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" />，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object that identifies the date and time of the account lockout.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识帐户锁定的日期和时间的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have an account lockout recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数与类型参数共同确定一个时间范围，返回的对象会在此时间范围内记录帐户锁定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the <c>time</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> 枚举值，用于指定应用到 <c>time</c> 参数的匹配类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of authentication principal objects that have an account lockout time recorded in the specified date and time range.
trans-unit.target: 返回身份验证主体对象的集合，这些对象在指定日期和时间范围内记录帐户锁定时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> that contains one or more <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" />，它包含一个或多个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在本地时间指定的时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`对象作为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" />，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象，用于标识密码设置的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have a password set recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数与类型参数共同使用可确定记录返回对象密码设置的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the <c>time</c> parameter.

trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> 集合，对象在指定的日期和时间范围内有一个锁定时间。

trans-unit.source: The following code connects to the ADAM instance hosted by the server "adamHost1.fabrikam.com" on port number "5000."
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码连接到托管服务器端口号"5000。"上的"adamHost1.fabrikam.com"ADAM 实例

trans-unit.source: The username (adamAdmin), and password (SecretPwd123) are specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的用户名 (adamAdmin) 和密码 (SecretPwd123)<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A search is performed for all authenticable principals under the container "DC=adamApp1,DC=fabrikam,DC=com" that have not logged on to this ADAM instance for the last 45 days.
trans-unit.target: 将为容器下的所有 authenticable 主体执行搜索"DC = adamApp1，DC = fabrikam，DC = com"不登录到此 ADAM 实例最近 45 天内。

trans-unit.source: The principals returned by the search are then deleted.
trans-unit.target: 然后删除搜索返回的主体。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" /> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext" />，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> collection of objects that have a logon time within the specified date and time range.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1" /> 集合，对象在指定的日期和时间范围内有登录时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the home directory for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此帐户的主目录。

trans-unit.source: The home directory for this account, or null if no home directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 此帐户的主目录；如果不存在主目录，则为 null。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the home drive for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此帐户的主驱动器。

trans-unit.source: The home drive for the account, or null if no home drive exists.
trans-unit.target: 此帐户的主驱动器；如果不存在主驱动器，则为 null。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the account is currently locked out.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指定帐户当前是否处于锁定状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the account is locked out; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果帐户已锁定，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: It is possible that an account may not be locked out when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A> returns a non-null value.
trans-unit.target: 可以帐户可能不会被锁定时<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A>返回一个非 null 值。

trans-unit.source: This method computes the correct store-specific lockout value to determine whether the account is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 此方法计算来确定该帐户锁定的正确存储特定锁定值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the date and time of the last incorrect password attempt on this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可以为 null 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定最后一次对此帐户进行不正确的密码尝试的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: A Nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the date and time of the last incorrect password attempt on this account, or null if no incorrect password tries are recorded.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以为 null 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定最后一次对此帐户进行不正确的密码尝试的日期和时间；如果未记录不正确的密码尝试，则为 null。

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the date and time of the last logon for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可以为 null 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定最后一次登录此帐户的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: A Nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the date and time of the last logon for this account.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以为 null 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定最后一次登录此帐户的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the last date and time that the password was set for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可以为 null 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定最后一次为此帐户设置密码的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: A Nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the last date and time that the password was set for this account.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以为 null 的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，用于指定最后一次为此帐户设置密码的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the password expires for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定此帐户的密码是否会过期。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the password expires for this account; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此帐户的密码过期，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether a password is required for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定此帐户是否需要密码。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a password is required for this account; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此帐户需要密码，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the times when the principal can logon.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主体可以登录的次数。

trans-unit.source: The permitted logon times for this account.
trans-unit.target: 此帐户的允许登录次数。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of workstations that this principal is permitted to log into.
trans-unit.target: 获取允许此主体登录的工作站的列表。

trans-unit.source: The mutable list of workstations that this principal is permitted to log into.
trans-unit.target: 允许此主体登录的工作站的可变列表。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes an expired password.
trans-unit.target: 刷新过期的密码。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
trans-unit.target: 将更改保存到存储区时发生异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the script path for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此帐户的脚本路径。

trans-unit.source: A path of the script for this account, or null if there is no script path.
trans-unit.target: 此帐户的脚本路径；如果没有脚本路径，则为 null。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The new password.
trans-unit.target: 新密码。

trans-unit.source: Sets the account password to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 将帐户密码设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the caller does not have appropriate rights, the new password does not meet password complexity requirements, or for any other reason that the underlying stores reject the password change.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用方没有相应权限、新密码不满足密码复杂度要求或由于任何其他原因基础存储区拒绝更改密码，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether a smartcard is required to log on to the account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定登录帐户是否需要智能卡。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a smartcard is required to log on to this account; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果登录此帐户需要智能卡，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Unlocks the account if it is currently locked out.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前帐户已锁定，则解锁该帐户。

trans-unit.source: The following example code connects to the LDAP domain "fabrikam.com" with the username (administrator) and password (SecretPwd123) initialized in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例连接到 LDAP 域"fabrikam.com"与 （管理员） 的用户名和密码 (SecretPwd123) 初始化中<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A search is performed to find the user with name "John Smith" under the container specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> constructor: "CN=Users,DC=fabrikam,DC=com."
trans-unit.target: 执行搜索以找到具有名称"John Smith"中指定的容器下的用户<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext>构造函数:"CN = Users，DC = fabrikam，DC = com。"

trans-unit.source: If the user is found, a check is performed to determine whether this user's account has been locked out. If the account has been locked out, the code example unlocks the account.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到该用户，则将执行检查以确定此用户的帐户是否已锁定。如果已锁定帐户，该代码示例将解锁该帐户。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
trans-unit.target: 将更改保存到存储区时发生异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the user can change the password for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定用户是否可以更改此帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this with a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal" />.
trans-unit.target: 请勿将其与 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal" /> 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is not permitted to change the password; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许用户更改密码，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended for computer principals.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不适合于计算机的主体。

trans-unit.source: Calling this with a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal> will cause a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 调用此操作与<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>将导致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: This principal object is not a user.
trans-unit.target: 此主体对象不是用户。
